General.Name: Nuscale Power Corp
General.Description: NuScale Power Corporation provides small modular reactor technology solutions. It offers NuScale Power Module (NPM), a water reactor that can generate 77 megawatts of electricity (MWe). The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Corvallis, Oregon. NuScale Power Corporation operates as a subsidiary of Fluor Enterprises, Inc.
General.Address: 1100 NE Circle Blvd, Corvallis, OR, United States, 97330
